examples.title: Header-Example:

examples.title: Success-Response:
AppVersion: 406
StateNotFound: 405
JWTNotFound: 401
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 401 JWTNotFound
{
        "ok": false,
        "name": "TokenExpiredError",
        "message": "jwt expired",
        "expiredAt": "2020-12-26T16:01:48.000Z"
}

examples.title: ServeError: 500

Success 200.description: Si la peticion ha sido exitosa o no
El estado del usuario (si está permitido loguearse o no)

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
        "ok": true,
        "message": "Login successful!",
        "user": {
            "user_id": 0,
            "token_id": 0,
            "role_id": 0,
            "role_name": 0,
            "first_name": "xxxxx",
            "last_name": "xxxxx",
            "username": "xxxx",
            "state": 1
        },
        "token": "xxxxxxx.xxxxxx-xxxxx&xxxxxxx",
        "expireIn": "0000000",
        "date": "xxxx-xx-xx x:xx:xx"
}

Error 4xx.description: El nombre del usuario no fue encontrado

examples.title: UserNotFound: 400
UserDisabled: 403
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 403 Disabled
{
        "ok": false,
        "message": "Usuario desactivado",
        "username": "juan",
        "state": 0
 }
